mapper.update: update cs_cancels set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, types = #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cs_cancels_marks_id = #{csCancelsMarksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, templete_info_xml = #{templeteInfoXml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
